English.Text: They can barely hold their breath long enough to reach the coral floor, and as such must cut the ship free in relays. Error creeps in to their work along with feelings of lightheadedness, and one of the divers slices his foot open on a shank of coral. Everyone is too absorbed in their task to notice, but once the ship is free and back at sea, the pustulent swelling of the man's foot becomes increasingly difficult to ignore...
